title: Basilica of Bom Jesus, Old Goa
caption: Basilica of Bom Jesus, Old Goa
desc: The church that you see in today’s image is the Basilica of Bom Jesus, in Old Goa, which was the capital of the state during Portuguese times. Construction of the church began way back in 1594, and it holds the mortal remains of St Francis Xavier, a saint still remembered for his apparent healing abilities.
